level.heading: SINGLE BUILDINGS AND BUILDING UNITS (ยง 11-2904)

level.text: For the purposes of the USN District, each Platform and all improvements constructed thereon are deemed to comprise a single building.

Any part of a single building that is not connected to any other part of the same single building, other than through the structure of the Platform, will be hereinafter referred to as a Building Unit.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4795 (June 3, 2011).
